content: I am trying to make a mathlib PR. I would like a cheap method of getting the olean files onto my system. If I use cache-olean --fetch then I have to be on the 3.4.2 branch, right? Does that still track master even though master uses 3.5.1? Did I miss instructions on how to use cache-olean now that we switched to 3.5.1?
You can be on the 3.5.1 branch and get the newest nightly.
You need to be on the 3.5.1 branch to get the latest nightly. The 3.4.2 nightlies haven't been updated for 8 days.
I didn't even know that the lean-3.5.1 branch existed until just now -- I didn't have it locally. I think I'm up to speed now. Thanks.
